EmailTemplate.name: Installer Application 2
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Sales Partner Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
Thanks for your interest in partnering with BlueWave!
To get started, please fill out the BlueWave Installer Application below. The application will ask for company details such as ownership and licensing information, as well as some general company history.
It may also ask you to upload necessary licenses.
A member of our BlueWave Quality Control Team will be in touch within 24 hours of completing your application.
Click here to start your application
Thanks for your interest and we look forward to a bright future ahead!
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.817.2703 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
